summary: At first glance, it is not obvious that Abigail Evans lives with a life-threatening skin disease. She is a typical teenager: moody, rebellious, irreverent, and is also strikingly beautiful.... See full summary Â»
cast: Abigail Evans|John Evans|Stacie Evans|Mark A. Gilger|Emily Gorell|Alfred Lane|Moise Levy|David T. Netscher|Shakeel A. Siddiqui
title: Butterfly Girl
